ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: I crave a cigarette to provide pleasure.
I crave a cigarette to provide relief from withdrawal.
I like the taste of cigarettes.
I smoke because it is pleasurable.
At times when I have been unable to smoke due to restrictions on smoking or because I was trying to quit, I experienced trouble falling asleep to the following extent:
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Mild; 2 = Moderate; 3 = Severe

ElementDescription: At times when I have been unable to smoke due to restrictions on smoking or because I was trying to quit, I experienced anxiety to the following extent:
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Mild; 2 = Moderate; 3 = Severe

ElementDescription: I smoke because smoking feels good.
At times when I have been unable to smoke due to restrictions on smoking or because I was trying to quit, I experienced depressed mood to the following extent:
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Mild; 2 = Moderate; 3 = Severe

ElementDescription: At times when I have been unable to smoke due to restrictions on smoking or because I was trying to quit, I experienced irritability, frustration, and/or anger to the following extent:
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Mild; 2 = Moderate; 3 = Severe

ElementDescription: I smoke to get a sense of euphoria or pleasure.
At times when I have been unable to smoke due to restrictions on smoking or because I was trying to quit, I experienced difficulty concentrating to the following extent:
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Mild; 2 = Moderate; 3 = Severe

ElementDescription: At times when I have been unable to smoke due to restrictions on smoking or because I was trying to quit, I experienced increased appetite and/or weight gain to the following extent:
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Mild; 2 = Moderate; 3 = Severe

ElementDescription: At times when I have been unable to smoke due to restrictions on smoking or because I was trying to quit, I experienced restlessness to the following extent:
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Mild; 2 = Moderate; 3 = Severe

ElementDescription: I crave alcohol to provide pleasure.
I crave alcohol to provide relief from withdrawal.
I like the way alcohol tastes or smells.
I use alcohol because it is pleasurable.
I use alcohol because it feels good.
I use alcohol to get a sense of euphoria or pleasure.
Trouble falling asleep.
Anxiety.
Depressed mood.
Irritability, frustration, or anger.

Change in appetite and/or weight.
